statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 8 \, x - 5 , 4 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 2 \, x - 5 , -x^{3} + x^{2} - 5 \, x + 5 , -3 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 2 \, x - 5 , 15 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 24 \, x - 15\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
